name: Steamed chicken momo
description: Tender steamed dumplings crafted with a savory filling of spiced ground chicken, wrapped in a thin flour dough, and served with a zesty tomato-chili dipping sauce that enhances its rich flavor.

name: Steamed Vegetable momo
description: Delicate steamed dumplings filled with a vibrant mix of finely chopped vegetables like cabbage, carrots, and spinach, encased in a soft flour dough, paired with a tangy tomato-chili sauce.

name: Fried chicken momo
description: Crispy fried dumplings packed with a flavorful filling of spiced ground chicken, wrapped in a golden flour dough, and served with a spicy tomato-chili sauce for a delightful crunch.

name: Fried vegetables momo
description: Crispy fried dumplings stuffed with a medley of seasoned vegetables including cabbage, carrots, and peas, encased in a crunchy flour dough, served with a tangy tomato-chili sauce.

name: Chicken jhol momo
description: Steamed dumplings immersed in a warm, spicy chicken broth infused with ginger, garlic, and Nepali spices, offering a comforting and flavorful soup-dumpling experience.

name: Vegetable jhol momo
description: Steamed dumplings served in a savory vegetable broth spiced with ginger, garlic, and traditional Nepali herbs, creating a hearty and aromatic soup-dumpling dish.

name: C momo
description: Steamed or fried dumplings coated with a bold chili sauce, offering a fiery kick and a unique twist on traditional momos, served with a side of tangy sauce.

name: Chatpate
description: A spicy street food blend of puffed rice, diced potatoes, chickpeas, and tomatoes, tossed with tamarind sauce and Nepali spices for a tangy, crunchy bite.

name: Pani puri
description: Crispy hollow puris filled with spiced water, mashed potatoes, and chickpeas, offering a burst of tangy and spicy flavors in every bite.

name: Vegetable platter
description: A generous assortment of vegetarian appetizers including samosas, momos, and vegetable pakoras, served with dipping sauces for a diverse taste experience.

name: Special mutton sekuwa set
description: Grilled mutton skewers marinated with Nepali spices, served with a side of achar and rice for a smoky and savory meal.

name: Chicken sausage
description: Juicy chicken sausages grilled to perfection, seasoned with herbs and spices, served with a side of dipping sauce.

name: Non veg platter
description: A hearty selection of non-vegetarian appetizers including sekuwa, chicken momos, and sausages, served with assorted sauces.

name: Hakula set
description: A traditional Nepali meal featuring rice, lentil curry, and assorted vegetable sides, cooked with authentic spices for a wholesome dish.

name: Batmas sadeko
description: A refreshing soybean salad seasoned with Nepali spices, onions, and tomatoes, offering a crunchy and tangy side dish.

name: Veg samosa
description: Crispy triangular pastries filled with a spiced mix of peas, potatoes, and carrots, deep-fried to golden perfection.

name: Veg chow mein
description: Stir-fried noodles tossed with a colorful blend of fresh vegetables like cabbage, bell peppers, and carrots, seasoned with soy sauce and spices.

name: Chicken chow mein
description: Stir-fried noodles combined with tender chicken strips, mixed vegetables, and a savory blend of soy sauce and Nepali spices.

name: Redbull
description: A carbonated energy drink packed with caffeine and taurine for a quick boost.

name: Water
description: Pure bottled still water for hydration.

name: Coke
description: Classic carbonated cola with a sweet and refreshing taste.

name: Fanta
description: Orange-flavored carbonated drink with a citrusy zing.

name: Sprite
description: Lemon-lime flavored carbonated drink with a crisp taste.

name: I need no sugar
description: Sugar-free carbonated drink with a light, refreshing taste.

name: No sugar
description: Sugar-free carbonated drink with a crisp flavor.

name: Mountain dew
description: Citrus-flavored carbonated drink with a bold taste.

name: Pepsi
description: Carbonated cola drink with a smooth, sweet flavor.

name: Sunkist
description: Orange-flavored carbonated drink with a tangy twist.

name: Solo
description: Lemon-flavored carbonated drink with a sharp, refreshing taste.

name: Sauce mild
description: A mild dipping sauce made with tomatoes and mild spices, perfect for momos and snacks.

name: Sauce spice
description: A spicy dipping sauce crafted with chili peppers and Nepali spices, ideal for adding heat to dishes.

name: Nepali Achar sadeko
description: A traditional Nepali pickled vegetable side dish, spiced with chili and turmeric for a tangy flavor.
